channel.title: Does anyone on here use Reverb Nation?
channel.description: I just wanted to get a third party thought about reverb nation because I'm seriously thinking about premium, is it worth the price?

item.title: Does anyone on here use Reverb Nation?
item.dc:creator: JacobJustus
item.description:
This is exactly why I asked thank you so much!

item.title: Does anyone on here use Reverb Nation?
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
Ehh personally I’m against paying for something like that. Figure you could get onto a small/med size label in that time and probably pay less.

I havent seen artists referencing places like reverb nation, but usually just they threw tracks around and people picked them up.

Edit: looked up some reviews for them. Nearly every review site I looked at seems to label those guys as a scam. Don’t do it.

sitejabber.com

ReverbNation Reviews - 1.7 Stars

103 reviews for ReverbNation, 1.7 stars: 'This web site will keep your interest with fake promise of promotion just to take your money, they send you offers and offers because they know you will bite any moment and them take your money'

https://www.trustpilot.com/review/www.reverbnation.com

Read full topic
item.source: Does anyone on here use Reverb Nation?
